mapper.insert: INSERT INTO businessman (bman_id, memb_id, bman_company_name, bman_license_number, bman_registration, bman_report, bman_bankbook, bman_account, bman_status) VALUES (#{businessmanId}, #{memberId}, #{companyName}, #{licenseNumber}, #{registration}, #{report}, #{bankbook}, #{account}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT bman_id as businessmanId, memb_id as memberId, rest_id as restaurantId, bman_company_name as companyName, bman_license_number as licenseNumber, bman_registration as registration, bman_report as report, bman_bankbook as bankbook, bman_create_date as createDate, bman_grant_date as grantDate, bman_account as account, bman_status as status FROM businessman WHERE bman_id = #{businessmanId}
mapper.update: UPDATE businessman SET rest_id=#{restId}, bman_status='REQUEST' WHERE bman_id=#{businessmanId}
